text: Some of the problems were reviewed yesterday at a meeting in Paris between M. Couve de Murville, French Foreign Minister, and Mr. Heath. MR. Selwyn Lloyd a man with troubles enough back home seems fated to fy into trouble abroad. Last year it was the riots in Istanbul, which enlivened the NATO Council meeting.
